name: Vazquezrosario pedro
body:
### Welcome to my Programming Portfolio.
System Engineer with a total combined experience of three (3+) years held at pharmaceutical, biotech, enterprise environments. Direct experience designing, developing, implementing new software to improve business functionalities. Manually tested software to ensure quality standards were met on a daily basis at Verizon while supporting various international teams utilizing agile framework. 
### Projects
-AgroWebPR

AgroWebPR is a web-based application that will establish the proper links from farmers, to processing plants, to distributors, and to the point-of-sale. The goal is to build an application that would provide a proper way for everyone to communicate, eliminating the inefficiencies that currently exist. Besides providing elegant search schemes for products and their variations, the application also focuses on providing a proper visual searching mechanism.

### Skills
Languages: SQL, Java, HTML, PHP, CSS, XML, Javascript, C++, Shell Scripting, PL/SQL
• Database: Oracle 10g/9i, MS SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL
• OS: Linux/Microsoft Windows/Mac OSX
• Knowledge of Agile framework development
• Proficiency in Software Installations, System Upgrades, Adobe (Dreamweaver, Photoshop, Flash, Fireworks)
• Technical Skills (software/hardware), Networking Skills (CCNA Exploring Module 1)

### Contact

You can email me at vazquez.pedropr@gmail.com
